daily_routine.morning: Most productive with code in the morning - start early reviewing MRs or planning
daily_routine.meetings: Prefer bundled meetings with at least 2 hours of focus time
daily_routine.end_of_day: Review work done, plan for next day

mentoring_approach.frequency: Weekly check-ins on feelings and blockers
mentoring_approach.feedback_style: Detailed feedback on work, guide through problem-solving
mentoring_approach.teaching: Share best practices and reasoning behind code decisions

remote_work_tips.environment: Dedicated office space, noise machine, shut door for focus
remote_work_tips.boundaries: Set start/end times, shut down computer at end of day
remote_work_tips.focus: Listen to music matching mood, minimize interruptions when possible
remote_work_tips.philosophy: Allow interruptions but protect focus time

code_review_philosophy.ideal: Equal positive and negative feedback in comments
code_review_philosophy.mindset: MR/PR makes contribution shared - code becomes co-owned after merge

career_advice.breaking_into_tech: Be persistent, fake it till you make it. Move forward with insatiable curiosity and skepticism. Learn by doing!
career_advice.switching_domains: Just give it a shot. Use AI to help bridge the language barrier between backend/frontend.
career_advice.leadership_development: Learn by doing and applying yourself. Background in finance and video games helped - persistence and adaptability.
career_advice.philosophy: Don't be afraid to take things apart to understand them

Realized he enjoyed eating gelato more than making it - didn't share sister's passion for the business
Grew up around family's restaurant business
Career transition from finance to tech in 2014
